title: Bloomberg Markets: Detrick Says 2017 Breaking Volatility Rules
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Detrick Says 2017 Breaking Volatility Rules
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Ryan Detrick\u0010Senior Market Strategist\u0010Lpl Financial \u0010Discussing technical analysis of the markets and why he expects the bull market to continue through 2018 and likely beyond.
